instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3059-a brd
threads.message: I can't find this board on the internet, if you can send it to me?

threads.title: 820-3059-a brd
threads.message: There are no boardview/schematics for Mac Mini. It's gonna have a dead GPU anyway.

threads.title: 820-3059-a brd
threads.message:
Not too much to do on a Mac Mini, apart of power problems, or BIOS.
And GPU change, when you suspect that.
As no schematics available, must use datasheet, or part of MacBooks/iMacs schematics, which use the same IC where you need to work.
